name: Dungeon Drafters (itch)
description:
Dungeon Drafters is dungeon crawler card game, where magic is cards and cards are magic.

Play as a young adventurer, eager to explore ancient dungeons and find long-forgotten cards to build the legendary spell deck that could defeat the one wielding the forbidden cards the entire world fears!

This is still a prototype, but we would love to get your support in the early stage of the game! We want to hear your ideas. Build a community and engage with our very first followers. If you are up to make part of this process and discuss with us what would be the best to the game, you might join us on Discord!
